inclusion.criterion: Women with 18 years of age or more
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Cognitive level adequate for understanding orientations during treatment
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Pregnant women or women who wish to get pregnant
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of CVA, neurogenic bladder with indwelling suprapubic catheter and multiple prior admissions for UTIs. Altered mental status and urosepsis are also present.
